articles.title: Intel launches RealSense ID, facial recognition tech that uses the company’s depth-sensing cameras - The Verge
articles.description: Intel announced the RealSense ID, a new addition to its depth-sensing camera tech for secure facial recognition. The device features a secure element for encrypting data and a neural network to adapt to changing faces over time.
articles.content:
